job_description:
• Develop and maintain datasets and tools that expand/automate our monitoring and alerting capabilities for reliability issues across Square and Cash tech stacks.
• Develop KPIs and measurement systems focused on product reliability.
• Partner with Engineering to leverage observability event data to triage and diagnose reliability issues.
• Partner with Engineering to design and develop new logging/events for reliability monitoring.
• Measure the impact of reliability issues on the business.
• 8+ years of data experienceFluency with SQL and PythonExperience using AI tools to accelerate development and enhance solutionsExperience working with dashboarding toolsExperience with ETLs and data engineeringExperience designing KPIs and measurement systemsFamiliarity with standard machine learning concepts and statistics conceptsFamiliarity with cloud engineering and cloud infrastructureExperience leading cross-functional projectsExperience working with technical and non-technical partners, including Engineering, Product, and Business teams.
